title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2408.8 - Registration of postsecondary curricula
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2408.8 - Registration of postsecondary curricula

State Regulations

Registration is required for every curriculum creditable
toward a degree offered by an educational institution subject to requirements
established by the corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2408.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
